Beautiful movie, excellent quality with the option of English or French audio. 

Only thing lacking are English subtitles but you can find them easily enough. There aren't any good French to English translations out there yet though.

Even so, THE QUALITY IS SO GOOD I DON'T CARE :DDD

The kids loved this movie, and so did I.
A=10,V=10,M=10
